DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine continue medical education ( CME ) program change primary care provider ' use insulin therapy - confidence selecting dos engagement patient decision make whether initiate insulin therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Continuing Medical Education ( CME ) Insulin Program
DOC.detailed_description: We determine whether attendee ' self-reported confidence use insulin person type 2 diabetes change attend CME program . Specifically , address follow question : Question 1 . Clinical guideline . Is insulin initiate earlier ( low A1C ) ? Question 2 . Decision-making . Does confidence select start insulin regimen change ? Does confidence select start insulin dose change ? Does confidence adjust insulin change ? Does confidence discussion nutrition guideline change ? Question 3 . Application . Do patient start use insulin ? Who usually select start dose ? How start dose select ? How often insulin adjust ? Question 4 . Resources . How available protocol insulin use ? How available adequate time monitor insulin therapy ? How available staff teach insulin injection ? How available staff help adjust insulin ?
DOC.criteria: primary care provider attend CME training
